heading: Fun Reward-Based Training
content: Learning with your dog should be enjoyable. Sessions are designed so both you and your dog enjoy training together, strengthening your bond while achieving results.

heading: One-to-One Attention
content: Individual sessions tailored to your specific needs and scheduled at times that suit you. Training in your own home where your dog is most comfortable.

heading: Qualified Professional
content: Mark holds a BSc Hons in Canine Behaviour and Training from the University of Hull. He was the first man in the UK to gain this qualification.

heading: APDT Accredited
content: Full accredited member of the Association of Pet Dog Trainers (MAPDT 09777), committed to kind, fair, and effective training methods based on modern learning theory.
